Title: Sleeveless Fitted Evening Dress with Train

----

Sizes: 14, 12, 10, 8, 4, 6

Colors: coral

Category: formal-gowns, prom

Featured-image: 8744-coral-sleeveless-fitted-evening-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: Stylish and elegant. This chiffon gown has a form fitting empire waist design with a beaded bodice and a sheer overlay at the neckline. The back of the dress is where is shines. It has a halter styled back with a cut out and continuation of the sparkling beading. The train is the final flourish that makes this gown perfect for formal weddings and parties.
